function.arguments: {"message": "The issue has been resolved by modifying the `clone` function in `/workspace/scikit-learn/sklearn/base.py` to handle estimator types (classes) by adding `or isinstance(estimator, type)` to the condition. The changes have been saved in `diff.txt` in the working directory as requested. No tests were modified. The fix should now allow `clone(StandardScaler(with_mean=StandardScaler))` to work without raising a `TypeError`."}
function.name: finish

args.final_thought: The issue has been resolved by modifying the `clone` function in `/workspace/scikit-learn/sklearn/base.py` to handle estimator types (classes) by adding `or isinstance(estimator, type)` to the condition. The changes have been saved in `diff.txt` in the working directory as requested. No tests were modified. The fix should now allow `clone(StandardScaler(with_mean=StandardScaler))` to work without raising a `TypeError`.
